properties.entry: SELECT /* semitest1.bidnow.post.model.dao.PostDAO#selectLaryTotalCount*/ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_POST A JOIN TBL_S_CATEGORY B ON (A.S_CTG_CODE = B.S_CTG_CODE) JOIN TBL_L_CATEGORY C ON (B.L_CTG_CODE = C.L_CTG_CODE) WHERE C.L_CTG_CODE = ? AND A.POST_CHK = 'Y'

SELECT /* semitest1.bidnow.post.model.dao.PostDAO#selectSmallTotalCount*/ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_POST A JOIN TBL_S_CATEGORY B ON (A.S_CTG_CODE = B.S_CTG_CODE) JOIN TBL_L_CATEGORY C ON (B.L_CTG_CODE = C.L_CTG_CODE) WHERE B.S_CTG_CODE = ? AND A.POST_CHK = 'Y'

SELECT /* semitest1.bidnow.post.model.dao.PostDAO#selectpostLaryList*/ E.RNUM , E.POST_NO , E.SELLER_NO , E.POSTED_DATE , E.POST_TITLE , E.POST_DETAILS , E.POST_CHK , E.DEALING_CHK , E.MIN_PRICE , E.PICTURE_ROOT , E.UNOPENED_CHK , E.BID_END_DATE , E.BID_STATUS , E.S_CTG_CODE , E.L_CTG_CODE , E.S_CTG_NAME , E.L_CTG_NAME FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , D.POST_NO , D.SELLER_NO , D.POSTED_DATE , D.POST_TITLE , D.POST_DETAILS , D.POST_CHK , D.DEALING_CHK , D.MIN_PRICE , D.PICTURE_ROOT , D.UNOPENED_CHK , D.BID_END_DATE , D.BID_STATUS , D.S_CTG_CODE , D.L_CTG_CODE , D.S_CTG_NAME , D.L_CTG_NAME FROM (SELECT A.POST_NO , A.SELLER_NO , A.POSTED_DATE , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_DETAILS , A.POST_CHK , A.DEALING_CHK , A.MIN_PRICE , A.PICTURE_ROOT , A.UNOPENED_CHK , A.BID_END_DATE , A.BID_STATUS , B.S_CTG_CODE , C.L_CTG_CODE , B.S_CTG_NAME , C.L_CTG_NAME FROM TBL_POST A JOIN TBL_S_CATEGORY B ON (A.S_CTG_CODE = B.S_CTG_CODE) JOIN TBL_L_CATEGORY C ON (B.L_CTG_CODE = C.L_CTG_CODE) WHERE C.L_CTG_CODE = ? AND A.POST_CHK = 'Y' ORDER BY A.POST_NO DESC ) D ) E WHERE E.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT /* semitest1.bidnow.post.model.dao.PostDAO#selectpostSmallList*/ E.RNUM , E.POST_NO , E.SELLER_NO , E.POSTED_DATE , E.POST_TITLE , E.POST_DETAILS , E.POST_CHK , E.DEALING_CHK , E.MIN_PRICE , E.PICTURE_ROOT , E.UNOPENED_CHK , E.BID_END_DATE , E.BID_STATUS , E.S_CTG_CODE , E.L_CTG_CODE , E.S_CTG_NAME , E.L_CTG_NAME FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , D.POST_NO , D.SELLER_NO , D.POSTED_DATE , D.POST_TITLE , D.POST_DETAILS , D.POST_CHK , D.DEALING_CHK , D.MIN_PRICE , D.PICTURE_ROOT , D.UNOPENED_CHK , D.BID_END_DATE , D.BID_STATUS , D.S_CTG_CODE , D.L_CTG_CODE , D.S_CTG_NAME , D.L_CTG_NAME FROM (SELECT A.POST_NO , A.SELLER_NO , A.POSTED_DATE , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_DETAILS , A.POST_CHK , A.DEALING_CHK , A.MIN_PRICE , A.PICTURE_ROOT , A.UNOPENED_CHK , A.BID_END_DATE , A.BID_STATUS , B.S_CTG_CODE , C.L_CTG_CODE , B.S_CTG_NAME , C.L_CTG_NAME FROM TBL_POST A JOIN TBL_S_CATEGORY B ON (A.S_CTG_CODE = B.S_CTG_CODE) JOIN TBL_L_CATEGORY C ON (B.L_CTG_CODE = C.L_CTG_CODE) WHERE B.S_CTG_CODE = ? AND A.POST_CHK = 'Y' ORDER BY A.POST_NO DESC ) D ) E WHERE E.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
